OnchainAffiliateHero.title:
Transparent Commerce 
 That Earns the Most
OnchainAffiliateHero.subtitle: Unlock opportunities as a merchant or co-seller with the latest onchain technology. As a community-driven platform, droplinked empowers anyone with the tools to earn more on every sale while getting paid faster

OnchainAffiliateFeatures.headingTitle: Tracking Production to Point of Sale
OnchainAffiliateFeatures.headingSubtitle:
Earn or distribute affiliate commissions with smart rule based logic, 
 minimizing fraud and automating payouts between parties based on contract terms

automatedDistributions.title: Automated Distributions
automatedDistributions.description: Earnings and commissions are processed and distributed automatically, eliminating the legacy processes and manual steps typically used on merchant networks today

transparentTransactions.title: Transparent Transactions
transparentTransactions.description: Leverage the power of blockchain technology to ensure full transparency. All transactions are recorded on-chain, providing tamper-proof operations for both brands and co-sellers

directSettlements.title: Direct Settlements
directSettlements.description: Enjoy instant, direct payouts on each sale. Whitelisted co-sellers receive commissions immediately without any intermediaries so that you can pay them the most

collaborateGrow.title: Collaborate & Grow
collaborateGrow.description: Partner with co-sellers to boost product visibility and increase sales to earn more

promoteEarn.title: Promote & Earn
promoteEarn.description: Select products, submit approval requests and track the status of requests and sales on the go

collaborateSell.title: Collaborate to Sell
collaborateSell.description: When approved, products are instantly accessible so you can start promoting and earning better commissions transparently

createStorefronts.title: Create Storefronts
createStorefronts.description: Set up a branded store, upload products, activate affiliates and set commission rates in minutes

manageRequests.title: Manage Requests
manageRequests.description: Review and approve co-seller requests inside the affiliate panel to whitelist trusted co-sellers

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.description: Create a storefront and explore the affiliate panel to find a variety of brand products to instantly add to a shop or product tile
